customer_account.save_my_information_label: Save this information for next time

stock.title: Inventory issues
stock.items_unavailable_notice: Some products became unavailable and your cart has been updated. We're sorry for the inconvenience.

order_summary.title: Order summary
order_summary.show_discount_form_link_label: Have a discount code? Click here to enter it
order_summary.cart_does_not_meet_discount_requirements: Your cart does not meet the requirements for the {{ code }} discount code
order_summary.discount_requires_customer_notice: Please submit your shipping information to apply the {{ code }} discount code
order_summary.customer_does_not_meet_discount_requirem: Customer information does not meet the requirements for the {{ code }} discount code
order_summary.shipping_information_does_not_meet_disco: Your shipping information does not meet the requirements for the {{ code }} discount code
order_summary.customer_already_used_once_per_customer_: The {{ code }} discount code has already been used
order_summary.discount_and_gift_card_savings_notice: After {{ discount_amount }} in discounts and {{ gift_card_amount }} in gift cards

shipping.title: Shipping method
shipping.waiting_on_rate_notice: Please wait while we fetch available shipping rates…
shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: There are no shipping methods available for your cart or destination.
shipping.no_rates_for_country_notice: We don't offer shipping to {{ country }}.
shipping.shipping_line_phone: Your courier may use this number to contact you.

other_method.other: {{ count }} other methods available starting at

payment.amazon_payments_login_hint: You will be asked to login with Amazon.
payment.title: Payment method
payment.show_gift_card_form_link_label: Have a gift card? Click here to enter it
payment.card_security_notice: All transactions are secure and encrypted.
payment.card_expiry_aria_description: Expiry date format: month, month, year, year
payment.card_verification_value_explanation: 3-digit security code usually found on the back of your card. American Express cards have a 4-digit code located on the front.
payment.card_verification_value_explanation_amex: 4-digit security code on the front of your card
payment.card_verification_value_explanation_othe: 3-digit security code on the back of your card
payment.free_order_notice_html: Your order is free. No payment is required.
payment.offsite_gateway_redirect_hint: After clicking "{{ button_label }}", you will be redirected to {{ gateway_label }} to complete your purchase securely.
payment.no_js_credit_card_fields_redirect_hint: You will be redirected to a payment gateway in order to add your payment information.
payment.card_fields_processing_error: An error occurred while processing the payment information. Please try again later.
payment.technical_error: Payments can't be processed right now because of technical problems. Please try again in a few minutes.
payment.no_method_error: Based on your location or products in your cart, there are no payment methods available.
payment.missing_credit_card_error: Cannot process a payment without a credit card

order_covered_by_gift_cards_notice.one: Your order is covered by your gift card.
order_covered_by_gift_cards_notice.other: Your order is covered by your gift cards.

card_fields_unavailable_html.one:
Credit and Debit card payments aren't available right now.
Please refresh this page or try again later.
card_fields_unavailable_html.other:
Credit and Debit card payments aren't available right now.
Please refresh this page or try a different payment method.

field_errors.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
field_errors.email_or_phone_blank: Please enter your email address or mobile phone number
field_errors.email_or_phone_invalid: Please enter a valid email address or a mobile phone number
field_errors.address_address2_blank: Please enter your apt, suite, etc
field_errors.address_phone_blank: Please enter a valid phone number
field_errors.address_zip_blank: Please enter your zip / postal code
field_errors.address_zip_invalid_for_country: Please enter a valid zip / postal code for {{ country }}
field_errors.address_zip_invalid_for_country_and_prov: Please enter a valid zip / postal code for {{ province }}, {{ country }}
field_errors.credit_card_name_blank: Please enter your name as shown on the credit card
field_errors.credit_card_number_invalid: Please enter a valid credit card number
field_errors.credit_card_expiry_invalid: Please enter a valid expiry date
field_errors.credit_card_month_invalid: Please enter a valid expiry month
field_errors.credit_card_year_invalid: Please enter a valid expiry year
field_errors.credit_card_start_invalid: Please enter a valid start date
field_errors.credit_card_start_month_invalid: Please enter a valid start month
field_errors.credit_card_start_year_invalid: Please enter a valid start year
field_errors.reduction_code_code_not_found: This code did not match any active gift card or discount. Was it entered correctly?
field_errors.reduction_code_discount_not_found: Unable to find a valid discount matching the code entered
field_errors.reduction_code_gift_card_unusable: Cannot use a gift card on an order containing a gift card.
field_errors.shipping_line_phone_blank: To use this delivery method, you need to enter your mobile phone number.
field_errors.shipping_line_phone_invalid: To use this delivery method, you need to enter a 10 digit mobile phone number.
field_errors.gift_card_already_applied: This gift card has already been applied to your order
field_errors.gift_card_disabled: Looks like this gift card is no longer available
field_errors.gift_card_expired: Looks like this gift card has expired
field_errors.gift_card_depleted: Looks like there are no remaining funds on this gift card
field_errors.gift_card_currency_mismatch: Only gift cards purchased in {{ checkout_currency }} can be applied to this order
field_errors.payment_gateway_needs_paid_plan_error: To complete this checkout you must be on a paid plan

payment_errors.generic_error: There was an error processing your payment. Please try again.
payment_errors.rejected_transaction: The payment provider rejected the transaction. Please try again.
payment_errors.credit_card_processing: We are experiencing technical difficulties while trying to process your credit card. Please try again in a few minutes.
payment_errors.order_total_changed: The total of your order has changed. Please make sure you're aware of the changes before completing your order.
payment_errors.payment_processing: There was a problem with the payment service. Please select a different payment method or try again later.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your cart has been modified and the shipping rate you previously selected no longer applies. Please select a new rate.

processing.redirecting_notice: Please wait while we redirect you.
processing.continue_to_payment_gateway_notice: Continue to the payment gateway to add your payment information.
processing.continue_to_payment_gateway_notice_error: Your payment information contains errors. Return to the payment gateway to correct them.
processing.title: Processing order

wait.long: You'll receive an email as soon as your order's processed. There's currently a high volume of orders.
wait.no_auto_refresh_html: If you're not automatically redirected, {{ link }}.

medium.one: Your order's being processed. Estimated wait time is 1 minute.
medium.other: Your order's being processed. Estimated wait time is {{ count }} minutes.

thank_you.title: Thank you for your purchase!
thank_you.confirmation_email_sent_text: A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}
thank_you.thank_you_description_html: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. Come back to this page for updates on your order status.
thank_you.thank_you_description: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. Come back to this page for updates on your order status.
thank_you.confirmed_description_html: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. Come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.confirmed_description: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. Come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.order_updates_description_html: Updates will be sent to {{ customer_contact }}
thank_you.in_transit_title: Your shipment is on the way
thank_you.in_transit_description: Come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.in_transit_description_days: You should receive your package in the next {{ number }} days.
thank_you.in_transit_description_today: You should receive your package today.
thank_you.in_transit_description_tomorrow: You should receive your package in the next day.
thank_you.no_tracking_number: There is no tracking number for this shipment.
thank_you.out_for_delivery_title: Your shipment is out for delivery
thank_you.out_for_delivery_description_html: Your shipment is on the delivery truck – expect it to arrive today. If you still haven't received it in the next 2 days, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.attempted_delivery_title: An attempt was made to deliver your shipment
thank_you.attempted_delivery_description_html: An attempt was made to deliver your shipment but it was unsuccessful. Please {{ contact_us }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.delivered_description_html: Your shipment has been delivered to the address you provided. If you haven't received it, or if you have any other problems, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant: According to {{ company }}, your order couldn't be delivered as planned. Please contact {{ company }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant_no_company: Your order couldn't be delivered as planned. Please contact us to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.login_title: Log in to view all shipment details
thank_you.login_description: You can find your order number in the receipt you received via email.
thank_you.cancelled_description: Your order was canceled on {{ date }}. Please contact us if you have any questions.
thank_you.unfulfilled_items_description: We are currently preparing these items for shipment.
thank_you.opt_in_message_html: Your information was successfully saved with Shopify Pay.
thank_you.order_updates_description_missing: You are not receiving shipping updates.
thank_you.order_updates_description_email_and_phon: Updates will be sent to {{ email }} and {{ phone }}.
thank_you.order_updates_subscribe_to_email_or_phon: Get shipping updates by email or SMS

remember_me.title: Remember me
remember_me.label: Save my information for a faster checkout
remember_me.description_html: Next time you check out here or on other stores powered by Shopify, you'll receive a code by SMS to securely purchase with Shopify Pay.
remember_me.terms_and_privacy_html: By continuing, you agree to Shopify Pay’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

guest.title: Use your saved information
guest.paragraph: You saved your information during a previous purchase, so you won’t need to enter it again. To use these details for checkout, enter the verification code sent to your phone.

logged_in_customer.title: Check out faster
logged_in_customer.paragraph: You saved your payment information during a previous purchase, so you won’t need to enter it again. To use these details for checkout, enter the verification code sent to your phone.

modal.verification_code_label: Verification code number that you received by text message

errors.enter_valid_code: The code you entered is incorrect

server.title: Shopify Pay unavailable
server.body: Your saved information can’t be used for this purchase. Please continue to the regular checkout.

throttle.title: Attempt limit is reached
throttle.body: Your code was incorrectly entered too many times. Please continue to the regular checkout.

authorize.title: Shopify Pay unavailable
authorize.body: Your saved information can’t be used at the moment. Enter your payment information to continue.
